power.title: Battle Fury Stance
power.fluff: You throw your full weight into each attack, ruining your defenses but scoring a crippling blow with each strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Battle Fury stance.
While you remain in the stance, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with Weapon attacks and melee and close Fighter attacks, but suffer a -2 penalty to AC.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +4 power bonus to damage rolls.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: +6 power bonus to damage rolls.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This stance immediately ends when you spend a healing surge or use total defense.
You can end this stance as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Battle Leader
power.fluff: Your leadership experience lets you enable nearby allies to move safely through combat

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Close burst 4

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Diplomacy

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Target allies can shift 1 square as a free interrupt, or 2 squares if they start or end the shift adjacent to you.
You then shift 1 square.

power.title: Boundless Endurance Stance
power.fluff: You shake off the worst of your wounds

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you are bloodied, you regain hit points equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
You enter the Boundless Endurance stance.
While you remain in the stance, you have regeneration when you are bloodied. The regeneration equals 2 + your Constitution modifier. The regeneration is not suppressed by any damage types.

power.title: Close the Gap
power.fluff: As your foe falls, you quickly move on to challenge a new enemy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy marked by you and within your reach drops to 0 hit points or less

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
You can mark one enemy that is within your reach. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Create Opening
power.fluff: You draw your enemy's attention, allowing an ally to slip away

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mark the target, and provoke an opportunity attack from it. You have a +2 bonus to defenses against this attack.
After the opportunity attack has been resolved, choose one ally adjacent to the target:
► If the attack was a hit, the ally can shift his or her speed as a free reaction.
► If the attack was a miss, the ally can move his or her speed as a free reaction.

power.title: Crowd Fighting
power.fluff: You roll with your foe's feeble attack, causing it to lash out at another nearby enemy

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Streetwise

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy misses you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature other than the triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, or 4 + your Dexterity modifier if it is within the triggering enemy's reach.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Dexterity modifier damage, or 8 + your Dexterity modifier damage if within reach.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Dexterity modifier damage, or 12 + your Dexterity modifier damage if within reach.

power.title: Defensive Stance
power.fluff: Dropping into a cautious stance, you maneuver around your opponent's attacks to get into position

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Defensive stance.
While you remain in the stance, you are slowed and gain a +2 power bonus to AC.

section.name: Shield:
section.text: If you are wielding a shield, you also gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex.
In addition, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Opportunity Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack; You shift 1 square, or 2 squares to a space adjacent to the triggering enemy.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can end this stance as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Eldritch Tactics
power.fluff: Using your talent for teleportation, you take an ally's place

section.name: Fey Step:
section.text: If you know the fey step racial power and it is not expended, this power is Close burst 5 instead

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must be eladrin

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target teleports, swapping positions.

If one target has a larger space than the other, the smaller target teleports into a position of your choice within the larger target's original space, and the larger target teleports into a position of your choice that fully covers the smaller target's original space.

power.title: Forceful Drag
power.fluff: You dig your fingers into a foe and drag the struggling opponent across the battlefield

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a creature grabbed

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature grabbed by you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. For each square you move, you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
The target remains grabbed, and you do not provoke an opportunity attack from it for this movement.
At the end of the move, you can end the grab to knock the target prone and slide it 1 square.

power.title: Full Extension
power.fluff: You lunge forward, hitting a spot well beyond where your foes thought you could reach

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The reach of the next melee Weapon attack you make before the end of your current turn increases by 1.

power.title: Get Out of There
power.fluff: You pull one of your allies into a more advantageous position

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to you. You can slide the target through your own space.

power.title: Glowering Threat
power.fluff: Your intimidating glare distracts your enemies as they attempt to attack your allies

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Intimidate

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the blast

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against any creature other than you. This penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Mighty Leap
power.fluff: You gather your strength for a truly impressive jump

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your current turn, you gain the following benefits:
► You gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks to jump.
► Any jump you make is considered to have a running start.
► You can use Athletics instead of Acrobatics to reduce falling damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can also use this power as a free interrupt with the following trigger and effect:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You fall

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use Athletics instead of Acrobatics to reduce the damage from the triggering fall.

power.title: Minor Resurgence
power.fluff: Your ability to withstand hardship grants you a temporary boost in combat

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Mobile Strikes Stance
power.fluff: The force of your strikes lets you sprint away from your foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Mobile Strikes stance.
While you remain in the stance, each time you hit an enemy with an at-will Weapon attack, you can move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as a free reaction.

power.title: No Opening
power.fluff: You raise your weapon or shield to block an opening in your defenses

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy attacks you and has combat advantage for the attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You don't grant combat advantage to the triggering enemy until the end of its current turn.

power.title: Perfect Pass
power.fluff: With perfect timing, you slip by your foe without dropping your guard

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose an enemy you can see, and move up to your speed.
As long as you end this movement in a square adjacent to the chosen enemy, your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from it.

power.title: Push Forward
power.fluff: Through careful timing and balanced footwork, you avoid your enmies' attacks as you advance

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Athletics

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 3 squares to a square adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Quick Escape
power.fluff: You quickly try to shake off whatever's holding you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an escape attempt, or make a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes or restrains you, even if it is not an effect that a save can end.

power.title: Shielded Sides
power.fluff: You whirl with your shield, concentrating on closing any holes in your defense

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex, and cannot be flanked.

true Requirement: bold You must be using a shield

Target: bold The triggering ally
true Effect: bold You push the target 3 squares.
true If the triggering enemy is within your reach, you mark it until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Shrewd Repositioning
power.fluff: An enemy's attack lands, but you spot a way to better your tactics

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Until the end of your next turn, you have a +2 bonus to AC against the triggering enemy.

section.name: Shield:
section.text: If you are using a shield, the bonus also applies to your Reflex.

power.title: Sidestep Maneuver
power.fluff: The enemy closes to strike, but you duck and ready a nasty counterstrike

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy ends its move in a square adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
You gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Single Out
power.fluff: Your fury in battle causes a nearby foe to quake with fear

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Intimidate

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy that can see you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
If you scored a critical hit or reduced a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less on this turn, the enemy also grants combat advantage on the first attack by an ally before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Snagging Grip
power.fluff: When you're knocked off balance, you grab hold of the enemy in front of you and bring it staggering along with you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are knocked prone or forced to move

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you were forced to move, for each square moved, you pull the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
If you were knocked prone, you knock the target prone.

power.title: Sudden Sprint
power.fluff: You put on a burst of speed as you launch yourself toward a foe

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Athletics

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier to a square adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Unstoppable Advance Stance
power.fluff: You swing with such fury that your foes are steadily driven back with each blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Unstoppable Advance stance.
While you remain in the stance, whenever you hit any creature with a melee Weapon attack, you push that creature 1 square and can shift 1 square to a square the creature vacated.

power.title: Who's Next?
power.fluff: When the foe crumples, you move forward to find your next foe

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have reduced a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less during this turn

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to your speed and gain a bonus to your next damage roll made before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals the number of squares you moved from your starting position.

section.name: Reaver Training:
section.text: If you have Reaver Training, you can also use this power as a free reaction with the following trigger in place of the requirement:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less with your enforce challenge
